name: Bosh Battles
description:
Bosh Battles is a 3D 4 player party brawler with extreme klutzy ragdoll physics set in a fantasy medieval world. Choose from 4 fantasy characters to fight with and dominate your enemies with a variety of weapons but be careful for the world itself might try and kill you...

We will be posting new builds of our game at least every month so everyone can see our progress throughout development!!!

Follow us on social media for regular updates:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/doghousegames9/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DoghouseGames9

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxwnwBa3Q30eV09soWGberw?view_as=subscriber

Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/Doghouse-Games-105468847866891
